title.rendered: Smile Colloquium: Dialogue on enhancing the impact of CBOs

content.rendered: The Smile Colloquium, a series of deliberations, was initiated by Smile Foundation and attended by senior corporate leaders and grassroots social leaders providing a collaborative platform for meaningful discussions, knowledge sharing, and exploring potential partnerships. Our Empowering Grassroots initiative builds CBO capacities through training and match funding, rooted in our global partnership with Change the Game Academy. This program enhances grassroots CBOs in over 15 countries, with Smile as the nodal partner for Asia and the only Indian organization.
